page.title: 15MED.&SOC.SERV.IN L.STAUGHTON
page.content: The nearest{Medical Practice}is in Kimbolton,Cambridgeshire, 4 miles away.The surgery times are 08.30 - 10.00 and 14.00-17.00. There is a special Well Baby Clinic fortnightly. Doctors will visit patients in their homes if they are not well enough to attend the surgery. The nearest {hospitals}are in Bedford 13 miles away. The main social services are for the elderly in the population. A District Nurse calls weekly if needed, and "Meals on Wheels" are delivered at least twice a week.There is a Day Centre in Bedford where the elderly play games and enjoy social activities.The villagers arrange a Summer outing and a Christmas Party and the "Clover Leaf Club" is run by the elderly people themselves.
